previous.excerpt: There's nothing wrong to protect your people, your society or your finance. We should be thankful if someone is protecting us when we are kids. However, every action comes with its consequences. And a grow-up should accept the consequences.
previous.title: Consequences of the Bailout

next.excerpt: Sun Tzu said: The art of war is of vital importance to the State. It is a matter of life and death, a road either to safety or to ruin. Hence it is a subject of inquiry which can on no account be neglected.
next.title: Art of War
